name: VANILLA GARDEN OF JUDGEMENT-Original Sound Track
detailed_description:
It is an original sound track of PC game "VANILLA GARDEN OF JUDGEMENT".
In addition to the main song songs, a total of 10 songs including OP theme "Green Storm!"
Enjoy the world of permanence immortalized by talented musician Ryo Lion.

【recorded music】
1.Vanilla
2. White curtain
3. Calm morning
4.White
5. Green Storm!
6. fumetsu
7.Black Water
8.Rain of sin
9. Glow
10.Frower Garden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 960 × 640 or more 32 bit full color
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1. GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 960 × 640 or more 32 bit full color
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
